p: The major components of the leaf essential oil of C. impressa were bicyclogermacrene (18.7%), ( E)-caryophyllene (10.8%), dodecanal (10.8%), ( E, E)-α-farnesene (7.9%), and α-humulene (6.3%). Germacrene D (55.5%) dominated the essential oil composition of C. infectoria, which was also composed of bicyclogermacrene (11.4%) and δ-elemene (5.1%) as major components.
